name: Scrum Run
description:
Controls: 

WASD to move

Mouse left button to shoot

you are a new software engineer in a large company, you are given a set of features to add to the software but the more features you add the more bugs you get, you have to fight to defeat these bugs but be careful, it can get get tiring sometimes, don't let them exhaust you.

the features given to you are from a scrum master, who is the boss of the team.

note: the game is very unpolished, im just happy i had a working product before the deadline
